name: Quick Scones
description: Rise and shine with the ultimate brunch stars you’ve been dreaming of, scones! And, they don’t play favourites. They’re equally fantastic whether you’re craving a sweet treat or a savoury surprise (try adding 3 Onion or CCB Dip Mix). Whip them up for special occasions or indulge in a lazy Sunday brunch.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
In a small bowl, whisk egg with milk. Set aside.
Cube butter; place in a large bowl with biscuit mix and spice. Using a fork or a pastry blender, cut butter until it’s the size of small peas. Add egg mixture and stir until evenly moistened.
Gently knead dough to form a ball; press out into an 8" circle. Using a sharp knife, cut into 8 wedges. Pull wedges apart and place on pan. Bake until golden-brown, 17–20 min.
tips: Use your favourite Dip Mix or Sweet Dip Mix to sweeten and flavour scones.

products.name: Quick Biscuit Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Save money and make your own restaurant-quality biscuits right at home with this Quick Biscuit Mix! The perfect side to any soup, stew, or chili dish.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
